name: CrowdSurfer
description:
Game Design Project for Game A Week Course under supervision of Prof.Csongor Baranyai

Game Description

The Theme of the Jam being "One-Button". The game is a infinte runner where you 

Crowdsurf into endless moshpit.

Key Features 

  • Made with Unity (Universal Render Pipeline Unity 2019.4.11f LTS)
  • Used Libreprite for 2d Sprites
  • Usage of unity's new 2d iight feature
